name: GameIconResearch_sachet_Lora
description:
"AI-Game Icon Institute-转身"

推荐使用<游戏图标研究所>大模型配合使用

This LORA must be activated using the trigger phrase of "game icon institute", otherwise it will not be effective.

LORA It is recommended to use <Game Icon Institute (2.2)

We are a group of dreamers trying to generate icons through AI technology. This is a large-scale testing game icon model and belongs to the beta version. We welcome you to join our group for discussion and to provide us with suggestions. The development of this model is Icon Academy's mass production version, and we welcome everyone to learn and exchange ideas together.

WhatsApp: https://chat.whatsapp.com/KEOdk9xkOuH9LSGkXSgwkI

Discord: https://discord.gg/njBMYJ7mRF

QQ群:489141941

LORA weight suggestion:0.4~1
